All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInfoService, RemoteService, SerializationPolicyProvider, Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class UserInfoServiceImpl
extends OdeRemoteServiceServlet
implements UserInfoService

Implementation of the user information service.

Note that this service must be state-less so that it can be run on multiple servers.

See Also:
